thread.title: Michelle Obama to host White House lawn camp-out
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama to host White House lawn camp-out

author: egarland@thehill.com (The Hill Staff)
title: Michelle Obama to host White House lawn camp-out
text: Michelle Obama to host White House lawn camp-out By The Hill Staff - 06/26/15 10:26 AM EDT ADVERTISEMENT Boehner doles out new punishment The latest intraparty purge has been particularly aggressive. Supreme Court upholds ObamaCare... The 6-3 decision by Chief Justice John Roberts is a huge victory for... Senate advances fast-track trade... The Senate on Tuesday voted to advance President Obama’s trade agenda,... Cliven Bundy will be held... Bundy and his supporters were in an armed standoff with federal officials... How Republicans pulled a fast one... It's the capture-the-flag you never saw coming. Washington whipped into frenzy... A decision could come as early as Monday in the blockbuster case. ObamaCare chief wins GOP raves The HHS secretary is one of President Obama’s most liked appointees.
